meanings.sent1: The pillowcase had a beautiful featherstitched border.
meanings.sent2: She wore a featherstitched dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked funny in its featherstitched hat.
meanings.sent4: The sky was a featherstitched tapestry of colors at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The garden was like a featherstitched quilt of flowers.

meanings.definition: To sew with a decorative stitch resembling a feather.
meanings.sent1: She featherstitched the edges of the tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: Grandma featherstitched a lovely design on the handkerchief.
meanings.sent3: The tailor featherstitched the pants with rainbow thread.
meanings.sent4: Her words featherstitched a delicate pattern of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The river featherstitched its way through the valley.
